channel.title: Runescape Selling out
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/exclusive-goggles-only-in-chrome
We’ve teamed up with Google to bring Chrome users a set of exclusive goggles to wear in-game. Whether you’re looking to style yourself as an eccentric engineer or to spruce up your forum avatar, these are a sartorially sound choice of headgear. Google Chrome is a great choice for RuneScape players looking for a browser that’s speedy, secure and simple to use; it’s already the browser of choice for 26% of our users, and is used right here in the Jagex office. For a limited time, those who choose to log in using Google Chrome will receive a pair of these prismatic marvels as a free gift.
Discuss

item.title: Runescape Selling out
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:64, topic:424528”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=527181.msg3847255#msg3847255 date=1323725074]

Im disgusted at how Jagex is marketing a product pushing through their game. Im so ready to go back to WoW
[/quote]Yes because Blizzard totally don’t do that all the time, taking it even further by producing horrible TV ads.

The only thing ingame they did that had to do with the actual world/product was when you could buy a pet from the blizzard store that donated to Japan. They don’t do special item crap though.

Got to admit, I like their commercials with Mr. T. and Chuck Norris lol.

I liked the Ozzy Ozborn one. He really is the prince of darkness. :P[/quote]
Haha, forgot that one.

Read full topic

I liked the Ozzy Ozborn one. He really is the prince of darkness.

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

chrome is good and fast, but not on rs! first time I tried to login rs… it said please wait and with a black screen finally I did a disk clean and was able to get on but it seems to lag more in bigger worlds than other browsers do

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Selling out
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:53, topic:424528”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=527181.msg3847323#msg3847323 date=1323727714]

No I mean in the game.

Rich IRL = Rich in-game.

Exactly, you can buy accounts (that’s never fun) or buy gold (that’s always fun, fuck earning gold).

If I was rich, I would make my own account and just buy the gold.
[/quote]

If I had a lot lot lot of money, I’d buy RuneScape.[/quote]

Hell yes. Imagine the look on people faces as you traded 2147m crackers and then declined.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Selling out
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Let’s look at 2006.
There were items that were from Medieval times with an exception of ‘Rune’, ‘Mithril’, etc. armor and stuff like that.

Now let’s look at 2011…
Google Chrome goggles
1 hit items (torva and shit)
A shitty ass ugly as fuck gameframe that looks like plastic instead of something from medieval times.
etc etc etc

Read full topic
